name.br: Pacote de Halloween para Fortalecimento A
name.fr: Boîte de Parchemins de Fusion d'Halloween A
name.jp: ハロウィン精錬スクロールパッケージA
name.sp: Paquete Pergamino de Fundición Halloween A

description.en: A package containing 25 Scroll of SProtect, 25 Scroll of Weapon Bonus and a Halloween Costume Box (choose Skeleton Set or Ghastly Ghoul Set or Mummy Set or Vampire Set). All items are also linked.
description.ar: A package containing 25 Scroll of SProtect, 25 Scroll of Weapon Bonus and a Halloween Costume Box (choose Skeleton Set or Ghastly Ghoul Set or Mummy Set or Vampire Set). All items are also linked.
description.br: Ao abrir este pacote você receberá os seguintes itens: (25x) Pergaminho de Proteção S, (25x) Pergaminho do Bônus de Arma e (x1) Caixa de Fantasia de Halloween (Escolha entre os conjuntos de Esqueleto, Carniçal Medonho, Múmia e Vampiro). Todos os itens são ligados à alma.
description.cns: A package containing 25 Scroll of SProtect, 25 Scroll of Weapon Bonus and a Halloween Costume Box (choose Skeleton Set or Ghastly Ghoul Set or Mummy Set or Vampire Set). All items are also linked.
description.de: Ein Paket, das 25 Scroll of SProtect, 25 Scroll of Weapon Bonus und eine Halloween Costume Box (wähle zwischen Skelelton Set, Zombie Set, Mummy Set oder Vampire Set aus) enthält. Alle Items sind seelengebunden.

description.fr: Paquet qui contient 25 Parchemins SProtect, 25 Parchemins de Bonus d'Arme et une Boîte Mystère de Tenue d'Halloween (au choix : Tenue de Squelette, de Zombie, de Momie ou de Vampire). Tous les objets sont liés.
description.id: Paket berisi 25 Scroll Sprotect, 25 Scroll of Weapon Bonus dan Halloween Costume Box (pilih Skeleton Set atau Ghastly Ghoul Set atau Mummy Set atau Vampire Set). Semua item juga terkait.
description.it: A package containing 25 Scroll of SProtect, 25 Scroll of Weapon Bonus and a Halloween Costume Box (choose Skeleton Set or Ghastly Ghoul Set or Mummy Set or Vampire Set). All items are also linked.
description.jp: 鍛冶屋の心得・精錬編x25、武器ボーナスの巻物x25とハロウィンコスチュームボックス（スケルトン、グール、ミイラ、ヴァンパイアセットから選択）を含むパッケージ。すべてのアイテムはリンクされています。

description.sp: Un paquete con 25 Pergamino de Protección S, 25 Pergamino Bonificación de Arma y Caja Traje de Halloween (elige entre Equipo Esqueleto, Equipo Necrófago Espantoso, Equipo Momia o Equipo Vampiro) . Los artículos están vinculados.

description.th: แพ็คเกจที่มี Scroll of SProtect 25 ม้วน, Scroll of Weapon Bonus 25 ม้วน และ Halloween Costume Box1 กล่อง (เลือกSkeleton Set หรือ Ghastly Ghoul Set หรือ Mummy Set หรือ Vampire Set) รายการทั้งหมดจะถูกผูกมัด
description.tw: 一個禮包含 25 個防護卷軸、25 個武器獎勵卷軸和一個萬聖節服裝箱（選擇骷髏套裝或可怕的食屍鬼套裝或木乃伊套裝或吸血鬼套裝）。所有物品皆為歸屬。
description.vi: Một gói bao gồm 25 Scroll of SProtect, 25 Scroll of Weapon Bonus và một Halloween Costume Box (chọn Skeleton Set hoặc Ghastly Ghoul Set hoặc Mummy Set hoặc Vampire Set). Tất cả các mục cũng được liên kết.
